experience: You and Andy both know Craig Fecteau, Ante Cajic, and 3 others

OnX offers customers a comprehensive suite of end-to-end enterprise data center solutions and services, including the industry's broadest choice of Cloud-based offerings and Services. Technology from its community of certified partners is incorporated into the solutions and services. OnX designs, builds and manages across all four of its core areas of expertise: Cloud & Managed Services; Digital Application Services; Professional Services; Hardware & Software Solutions.

At Relus, we believe a company is only as strong as the people within it. This belief carries over into our IT staffing and recruiting methodology. We are a technology company that offers our clients strategically sourced IT candidates — not the traditional staffing model. Our framework ensures we are only involved where we add real value to our clients’ efforts.-Manage fluctuations in your IT project requirements to keep your staff lean, yet efficient-Transition staffing, delivery and management during major business workload peaks-Control costs, meet short-term goals, and provide access to specialized IT skill sets on an as-needed basis-Post-purchase hardware installation, implementation and education to get you operational quicklyWe support our clients in forecasting workforce demands and develop staffing strategies to deliver fully vetted resources across multiple technology disciplines. Relus provides the best knowledge and experience by bringing together brilliant minds and advanced technology.Meet our Talent Delivery Team: http://relus.com/staff/

Agile is an innovative IT staffing and consulting firm that speeds time to talent by matching great people to great opportunities, enabling clients to drive business results and create competitive advantage. Agile serves technology leaders throughout the Southeast, placing skilled IT staff in four functional areas: -Application Architecture & Delivery-Enterprise Operations-Information Lifecycle Management-Project Management. Agile’s CIO Advisory Services connect clients with top current and former CIOs, providing access to advice, input and consulting services.

iSymmetry, Inc. is a leading provider of on-demand consulting and recruiting services to Global Commercial Enterprises. iSymmetry delivers high-end IT and business consultants, including ERP, EAI, SCM, CRM, BI, Database Design & Development, Business Process Management consultants, functional leads and project managers. Our specialty is delivering hard-to-find, highly skilled IT and business professionals with proven experience. We consistently find and place the industry’s best consultants. iSymmetry consultants are known for leading teams, reducing costs and improving overall project productivity and quality.We have many opportunities to offer talented professionals who are passionate about delivering innovative technology solutions. We build long-term relationships with experienced IT professionals and continue to offer extraordinary opportunities for those who are ready for a new challenge.
University of Georgia - Terry College of Business

Andy is not only a great recruiter, but a great mentor. When it comes to recruiting, Andy is motivated to connect amazing candidates to amazing opportunities and won't stop till the job is filled. He knows his clients and their expectations and without fail is able to find them the perfect candidate. Andy was heavily involved in my training at Agile and was able to share his experiences and knowledge to set me up for success! Andy is a recruiting expert and it was great to have the opportunity to work with him!

Andy has an aptitude for understanding and matching the needs of both employer clients and job seekers that makes him stand out from the thousands of recruiters on the Internet.  We have worked together twice in a collaborative effort to match my skills with potential employers, and during the process, he provided timely updates on the progress of the candidate search, as well as information on the personnel with whom I would be meeting. Andy was also invaluable as an intermediary in the employment package negotiations. Andy was the best decision I made in my job search!

May 10, 2013, Terri worked with Andy but at different companies

Andy, has expertise in recruiting and coaching IT personnel for the perfect fit job. He recognizes talent and coaches you all the way from your resume, phone interviews, in person interviews and landing the job. Andy contacted me after I posted my resume and applied for a job at Agile. Andy was quick to call and spent much time educating me on the company, position and preparing me for the interviews.  I have worked for two other contracting companies in the last 7 years, and Andy  was the only recruiting/contracting company that landed me a full time position with a wonderful company and great benefits.  Not only is Andy a professional but takes a very personal interest in your success. I strongly recommend you send Andy your resume if you are looking or thinking about changing jobs or careers. Thank you Andy, for the great job you did for me.
